entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • simpleruntimeeventvalidation test failing in CI #88499
  • [wasm] `System.Collections.Immutable.Tests` - v8 crashing at the end with "Reached heap limit" - for AOT builds #88497
    8.0.0
  • System.Reflection on NET Self Contained app fails with TypeLoadException (net fx based assembly) #88496
  • SslStream can get stuck on large transfers with TLS 1.3 #88495
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] WasmBase.IsSupported no longer returns true #88494
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT app crashes when run on a machine with an ETW session with GCHeapDump and Type keywords enabled #88491
  • Optimize `VectorXX` equality checks in JIT #88490
    Future
  • Finding Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting service provider with using IDesignTimeDbContextFactory #88485
  • Missing libSystem.Net.Security.Native.so when publishing self-contained single-file project on Linux #88481
  • [API Proposal]: Unsafe.IsAddressLessThanOrEqualTo / IsAddressGreaterThanOrEqualTo #88478
  • `System.Reflection` - `Type.GetCustomAttributes` Unexpected Attribute Count behavior #88473
  • Performance issue occurs while using DynamicInvoke #88469
  • CreateAppHost fails processing Win32 resources #88465
  • DoStackSnapshot behaves differently on Windows x86 and x64 WRT stack unwinding #88463
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: Regressions in System.Collections.Concurrent.IsEmpty<Int32> #88483
  • 6 Regressions in System.MathBenchmarks.(Min/Max) #88482
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: HttpClientFactory AddMetricsEnrichment #88460
    Future
  • ConfigurationManager.GetSection("system.diagnostics") throws ConfigurationErrorsException on net6.0 #88456
    8.0.0

Closed

  • MemoryMappedFile is slow on Linux, shm_open not used #88489
  • MSB4018 The "ConvertDllsToWebCil" task failed unexpectedly #88442
    8.0.0
  • Blazor - System.Security.Cryptography.Algorithms is not supported on this platform #87214
    Future
  • deligent pck.ageing #next CAP #88484
  • HttpClientHandler always set LocalCertificateSelectionCallback delegate in SslOptions #75434
    Future
  • Minor documentation error for `IFloatingPoint<TSelf>.Round(TSelf, int, MidpointRounding)` #88401
  • Microsoft.VisualBasic.Strings.InStr with CompareMethod.Text is 10x slower in .NET 7 than in .NET Framework 4.8 #88416
  • AttributeUsage behaving wrong on inherited Attributes #88476
  • Add DivMod instrinct for intel x86/x64 #27292
    Future
  • Cannot modify the static field of dependent module on dynamically-loaded library using hostfxr(DNNE) #88427
  • JIT: Another missing normalize on load example #85672
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Missing normalize-on-load for small-typed arg live across EH #83149
    8.0.0
  • DotnetRuntime provider needs to handle WCHAR strings #87978
    8.0.0
  • debug the AOT project ilc .sln went wrong #88459
    Future
  • IDictionary - ConcurrentDictionary TryAdd throws Exception #88461
  • [API Proposal]: ConcurrentQueue.TryDequeue with condition #88412
  • Potential 1.5x performance improvement for `Random.Shuffle()` #82838
  • Changes to default comparer for byte broke BinaryFormatter tests #88453
  • Unexpected error message - The configuration of 'ExceptionMarshalling' and 'ExceptionMarshallingCustomType' on method 'Demo.MySafeHandle' is invalid. #88448
    8.0.0
  • crossgen2's `--compilebubblegenerics` causes live lock at app start (100% CPU usage) #78117
    8.0.0
  • Bug in the lock-free logic of DacEnumerableHash #85688
  • crossgen2 fails on assemblies that include embedded types #67855
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Disable runtime test dependent on creating a process #88498
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [RISC-V, LOONGARCH64] Fix FuncEvalHijack stack allocation #88493
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ignore suppressed diagnostics in code fix verifier #88492
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated with NegotiateClientCertificateAsync #88488
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Use E3 to completely clear console on Unix when possible #88487
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Dev/tommcdon/perfmaps tmp 6 #88486
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Disable default JSON reflection when PublishTrimmed == true #88480
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [iOS][MacOS] Run tests on iOS 17 and MacOS 14 scouting queues #88479
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ConsoleLoggerProvider should reuse ConsoleUtils helper to align the behaviors #88477
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Enable loading COM component in default ALC via runtime config setting #88475
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Enable loading COM component in default ALC via runtime config setting #88474
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 7.0.x
  • Add collection literal support for immutable collections #88470
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Prevent Arm64 CrossDac builds running on Arm64. #88467
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [mono][interp] Tweaks to x86 call convention handling #88466
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Move Win32 resource emission to the compiler #88464
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix minor documentation error for `IFloatingPoint<TSelf>.Round(TSelf, int, MidpointRounding)` #88458
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Ensure GCHeap related debugging still works even when we use newer CLRGC to target older runtimes #88457
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Adding Vector paths to ASCII GetIndexOfFirstNonAscii* Paths #88455
    community-contribution, needs-area-label

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #87805
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #87804
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • NativeAOT Watson changes for crashes/unhandled exceptions #88273
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • fix TLS resume with HttpClientHandler on Linux #88214
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Tar: use UtcDateTime when setting last write time. #88462
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [MONO] Incorrect timestamps for perf events #88428
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Disable System.Diagnostics.Tests.EventLogMessagesTests.CanReadAndWriteMessages on Windows 11 #88472
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Enable reading process environment variables in EventPipe #87771
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Inline TLS field access for linux/osx x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Increase instruction group size #88468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals when widening #87141
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Add NdkToolFinder task & Fix up AOT app build #88210
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] Fix sorting custom attributes in ILStrip #88437
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Fix floating point #88311
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Update branding to 6.0.21 #88444
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 7.0.10 #88445
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete formatter test blob for `EqualityComparer<byte>.Default` #88454
    needs-area-label
  • Fix diagnostic message #88450
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix unsafe walking of DacEnumerableHash #88063
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Disable use of certains R2R data structures in the DAC #88446
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix which path is taken in Enumerable.Select for empty partition #88425
    area-System.Linq
  • Type equivalence support in Crossgen2 #87899
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add consultants for some extensions areas #88430
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Speed up KeyAnalyser #87590
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enabled embedded broadcast for binary ops #87946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Update testing.md #88364
    area-Meta
  • Do not say the wrong default behavior for blittable arrays in ComInterfaceGenerator warning #88212
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Optimize const ShiftRightLogical for byte values on XArch #86841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Rewrite DbBuffer Read/Write methods with stackalloc #88395
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • EventPipe support for ProcessInfo #87562
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix missing GC events on non-Windows for nativeaot #88282
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Restructure NegotiateAuthentication implementation #87930
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Expose IUtf8SpanParsable and implement it on the primitive numeric types #86875
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add missing compiler-generated attributes to corelib #87857
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V] Fix .cfi directives for ThePreStub #88259
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Remove handwritten binding logic from Logging.Console; use generator instead #88067
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [libs][Unix][perf] Lazily initialize TimeZoneInfo names and order GetSystemTimeZones by Ids #88368
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging][mono][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #88336
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.11
  • [release/6.0-staging][mono][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #88351
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.21
  • Ensure that NI_Vector_Dot is always handled as TYP_SIMD #88447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Poolable / Resettable CBOR Readers #88104
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix DevDiv_718151 test #88404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Extend `JsonIncludeAttribute` and `JsonConstructorAttribute` support to internal and private members #88452
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Print variable types when dumping the output #88420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range initialization, take 2 #87992
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • JIT: Intrinsify UTF16->UTF8 conversion for string literals (Encoding.UTF8.TryGetBytes) #85328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Bring back old array enumerator code #88371
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Using stackalloc instead of new byte[x] on Streams #88303
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Optimizes vector conversions with AVX512 #87878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add some xml comments #88433
    area-Meta
  • Add SearchValues<string> #88394
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Update missing runtime/framework install URL to use host RID #88359
    area-Host
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.content:

Created

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Primary ctor parameter writes should be assumed necessary even if not read later in the method #68904
  • VisualBasicUseCollectionInitializerDiagnosticAnalyzer fails with ArgumentOutOfRangeException #68899
  • CS0111 error upon rebuild #68895

Closed

  • Test plan for "file types" #60819
    17.7
  • Rules to help with conflicts between Primary Constructor parameters and field style rules #68743
  • Cover and covering And Cover #68898
  • Compiler crashes when attempting to compile string interpolation concatenation with parentheses applied #68834
    17.8
  • Collection literal parsing doesn't handle a few cases well/properly. #68766
    C# 12.0
  • "foreach (ref read)" causes an assert in assertBindIdentifierTargets for the "read" identifier #68782
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Move to using primary constructors. #68907
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Moving lexing functions out of SlidingTextWindow #68906
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce memory consumption around SpellChecker object creation/usage. #68905
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add fuzzer for incremental generators #68903
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Don't hardcode C# 9 in function pointer tests #68902
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add filePath when generates new Document in MoveTypeEditor #68900
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • External Access EditorConfig generation #68896
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Gracefully handle exceptions from DiagnosticSuppressor.SupportedSuppressions in IDE #68894
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement simple LSP run tests #68889
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Share implementation code for xml-doc close-tag completion between C# and VB #68901
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use primary constructors in features layer #68897
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix crash in interpolation handling #68845
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update to 17.7.58 #68890
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge features/CollectionLiterals into Main #68886
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify and make consistent query-context tracking in the parser #68757
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • BindRefExpression - bind expression in error recovery mode. #68887
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add support for `System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute` #68702
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Disallow applying `RequiresLocation` and `Out` attributes to `ref readonly` parameters in source #68871
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Filter `RequiresLocationAttribute` from `ref readonly` parameters #68870
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Avoid quadratic lookup of namespace declarations #68832
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Update Compiler Breaking Changes - post VS2019.md #68674
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [Infra] Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Testing to 1.1.2-beta1.23323.1 #68888
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Add EA package for the compiler developer SDK #68628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid loading Roslyn through All In One Search when Roslyn isn't loaded yet. #68644
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Check ReturnsVoidIsSetBit flag #68846
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix ordering issue in analyzer callbacks for nested actions in symbol start analyzers #68490
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GET request with Content-Type multipart/form-data causes validation error #49252
  • Perf regression: single_query #49251
  • Perf improvement: json, updates #49250
  • [Blazor] debugging startup takes 24 seconds while without it loads instantly #49244
  • Avoid authentication redirect if previously authenticated and valid token exist #49242
  • Perf regression: fortunes #49240
  • .net core 7 AddProblemDetails only show Response Header #49239

Closed

  • Restore failing locally in main branch #48921
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #49231
  • Unix socket not deleted at startup in Blazor.DevServer #46001
    8.0-preview7
  • NTLM Support in Linux Containers #48971
  • All low allowance #49248
  • ClientAssets release for dotnet 7 #49092
    8.0-preview7
  • Double scheme for App ID URI with Blazor WASM template (hosted, single org) #27417
    Backlog
  • API Review: Make IAcceptsMetadata and IProducesResponseTypeMetadata public. #47994
    8.0
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plaintext #49213
  • Perf regression: caching #49232
  • Can IApiDescriptionGroupNameProvider add string[]? GroupName #48685
  • Unable to install 6.0.18 or 6.0.19 on Server 2016 #49058

PullRequests

Created

  • Support for X-Forwarded-Prefix in ForwardedHeadersMiddleware #49249
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [hotreload] Change file encode #49247
    area-mvc
  • Add WebApplication.CreateEmptyBuilder #49246
    area-runtime, area-hosting
  • [Blazor] Improvements to the interaction between SSR and interactive rendering #49238
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Update MCA dependencies for interceptors feature #49245
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • Update SDK #49034
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • Fix Http MinimalSample #49174
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 8.0-preview7
  • Use SearchValues in HostString #49114
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview7
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `04cf298` to `be03d00` #49137
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.21
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `04cf298` to `be03d00` #49136
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.10
  • [release/6.0] Backport 48892 to 6.0 #48914
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 6.0.21
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ec4fed9` to `251e720` #49110
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2214810 #49228
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview7
  • Add public metadata types. #49068
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • Add support for anti-forgery middleware #49233
    area-middleware
  • Update area-owners.md #49229
    area-infrastructure
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48817
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Add EmptyContent parameter to Virtualize component #49185
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Backport pr 48892 to 7.0 #48911
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime
  • use new System.Text.Ascii APIs, remove internal helpers #48368
    area-networking
  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Remove ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer #49193
    area-identity

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ListView not rendering items in positions where Headers were, after disabling grouping #16031
  • KeyboardEventArgs attributes Code is "" and Key is "Undefined" on mobile Android. #16030
  • Feature request: A way to profile the performance of XAML bindings #16028
  • PlatformNotSupported exception on iOS Release build from DevOps pipeline #16025
  • DatePicker runtime error during DateSelected event #16022
  • Binding CollectionView/CarouselView to lists of primitive types doesn't work on Release Builds #16021
  • [MAUI][.NET8] Newly created recipes cannot be deleted. #16020
  • WordWrap on labels with padding does not work properly on iOS. #16018
  • Shell TitleView not reliable #16015
  • MAUI push notifications not received in OnMessageReceived unless trimming disabled on android #16014

Closed

  • ImageButton with CornerRadius is not calculated as expected on Android when Padding exists #11874
    Backlog
  • Width/Text rendering on Android Button with ImageSource when ContentLayout set to Top #12288
    Backlog
  • Entry.IsSpellCheckEnabled="False" still shows squiggly line #8558
    Backlog
  • Illegal Clip value did not throw exceptions at compile time and DEBUG mode #12900
    Backlog
  • Maui app softlock #13044
    Backlog
  • How can I export Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Handlers.Compatibility to my component #16016

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve the customization of WebView on Android #16032
  • Make WinUI FilePicker FutureAccessList more robust #16026
    area/essentials 🍞

Merged

  • Fix IsSpellCheckEnabled #15459
    area/controls 🎮
  • Ensure "text boxes" preserve cursor location #15099
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #16023
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #15988
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Colors are not set #15668
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • Start docs for UITesting #15836
    area/testing
  • Fix OnBackButtonPressed on iOS (#8296) #14137
    community ✨
  • Add 'TranslateXTo' and 'TranslateYTo' to 'ViewExtensions'. #15906
    community ✨
  • Refactor `IsRefreshing` property to separate animation and command execution responsibilities #15732
    area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value #15512
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    community ✨
  • Windows Device tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • [iOS] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15748
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • Android: fix dialog button colors in dark mode #15091
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-dialogalert
  • Implement rate for TextToSpeech on supported platforms #15528
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Android: recreate activity on dark mode change #15449
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/theme
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures
  • [iOS] Fix Editor placeholder issues #15883
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, i/regression
  • Controls(Android): fix frame background color #14917
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Use base Width and Height on Android PlatformGraphicsView #15721
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add `Exists` and `ExistsAsync` like `Find` and `FindAsync` #31203
  • Json: BigModel_with_JSON_columns test fails to find JsonValueReaderWriter when processing compiled model #31201
  • Optimize JsonScalarExpression within OpenJson/json_each #31200
    Backlog
  • #"if" level designation #31199
  • work with timespan and compare them #31196
  • How to use dotnet required keyword and [key] attribute together? #31195
  • Install Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer into project .NET 7 error #31194

Closed

  • Silent data loss when adding objects to an sqlite DB with PRAGMA journal_mode=DELETE in a multi-threaded environment. #30851
    6.0.20
  • Scaffolding synapse fails when attempting to enumerate triggers #30998
    7.0.10
  • Optimized translation for indexing of JSON primitive collections #30724
    8.0.0
  • NullReferenceException when using JSON columns with database provider that does not support them (e.g. SQLite, MySQL) #29738
  • Querying an entity, that has previously been updated using Attach, using Include does not include the entity #31183
  • Documentation: Update code snippets in README files with `using` declarations (without braces) #31088
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • [manual] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #31202
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Fix handling of queries with RETURNING clause #31013
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.21
  • [manual] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/7.0' #31198
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/7.x] Disable trigger enumeration on Azure Synapse Analytics, where triggers are not supported #31036
    Servicing-approved, community-contribution, 7.0.10
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31193
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Documentation: Use `using` declarations in README files #31089
    community-contribution
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.34.0 to 3.35.1 #31165
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • update SDK to nightly #31188

Updated

  • Fix to #30604 - Implement JSON serialization/deserialization via Utf8JsonReader/Utf8JsonWriter #31160
  • Add complex property support to relational model #31174
